BasicLuck.Description: Grants the player a 20% banner luck boost

50%Exp.Description: Grants the player a 50% (PLAYER EXP BOOST)

ShinyBoost.Description: Grants the player a 10% banner shiny luck boost

LegendsBoost.Description: Grants the player a 2x drop chance boost for (unit) in Legend Stages

MegaLuck.Description: Grants the player a 100% banner luck boost and a 10% banner shiny luck boost

SuperLuck.Description: Grants the player a 50% banner luck boost
